text:
Hello everyone, hope all is well!

I am new to HubSpot, my intention is to leave Google Analytics behind and get a better Analytics without sharing data with anyone else.
I am having some doubts here, I am creating a serverless frontend application and I am around 2 hours looking at the docs here and I can’t find a `Get Started`  section to guide me through some code and api’s that I should use in my code base.

Thank you in advance =)

I am using "<https://api.hubapi.com/oauth/v1/token>" to get the access token it works fine in post man and it take following value in the body
grant_type=authorization_code&client_id=xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx&client_secret=yyyyyyyy-yyyy-yyyy-yyyy-yyyyyyyyyyyy&redirect_uri=<https://www.example.com/&code=zzzzzzzz-zzzz-zzzz-zzzz-zzzzzzzzzzzz>
here you can see that it need code which is of type guid , but I am not able to get this code in C# web api (from where I am calling this )

I have to paste following URL in the browser to get code

<https://app.HubSpot.com/oauth/authorize?client_id=xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx&redirect_uri=https://www.example.com/&scope=contacts>

how can I get this code in C# code ?
